sentences: Kõige suurim asi, mida ma olen kunagi näinud.
Ta tegi suurima viga oma elus.
context: The word 'suurim' is the superlative form of the Estonian adjective 'suur' (big/large). It means the largest, greatest, or biggest in comparison to others. As a superlative, it indicates that something exceeds all others in size, importance, or degree. In Estonian, superlatives are formed by adding '-im' to the comparative base form.
